title: Calories in a Chipotle Tortilla
meta_description: Discover calories in a chipotle tortilla—about 320 kcal—plus full nutrition breakdown, macros, and tweaks for burritos or tacos.
assumptions: Standard Chipotle flour tortilla (13-inch size for burritos), plain, no fillings or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by exact recipe, size, brand replication, and preparation; check Chipotle's official info or labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard Chipotle flour tortilla provides ~320 kcal, mostly from carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use half the tortilla (for quesadilla style)

faqs.q: How many calories in a Chipotle flour tortilla?
faqs.a: About 320 kcal for one standard 13-inch tortilla.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a chipotle tortilla?
faqs.a: Roughly 60 g total carbs, including 4 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is a Chipotle tortilla high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 670 mg per tortilla due to added salt.

faqs.q: Calories in Chipotle corn vs flour tortilla?
faqs.a: Corn is lower at ~145 kcal; flour is 320 kcal.

faqs.q: Does toasting a chipotle tortilla add calories?
faqs.a: Minimal if dry-toasted; adds ~40 kcal with 1 tsp oil.
